name: Chasing Moriarty
description:
Professor Moriarty is once again up to his criminal shenanigans in Europe. Can you help Sherlock Holmes and Doctor Watson capture Moriarty before he once again slips out of reach?

Made as a submission for Aalto Games Now! Online Jam #6: Neighbours, by the following people:

  • Jussi Kenkkilä - Game Design
  • Tuure Saloheimo - Programming
  • Sini Haapanen - Background Art
